job.title: Experienced .NET Developer for Civil 3D Automation
job.description:
We are seeking an experienced .NET developer to join our team and assist with building automation for Civil 3D. 

This project involves helping us develop custom tools and scripts to automate repetitive tasks, improve efficiency, and enhance the functionality of Civil 3D using Dynamo and VS. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in .NET, IronPython, C#, VB, familiarity with Civil 3D (and ideally familiarity with Revit), and a solid understanding of object-oriented programming and generative design. 

Attention to detail, problem-solving skills, and the ability to work independently are essential. If you have a passion for software development and are eager to contribute to streamlining design workflows in the civil engineering industry, we would love to hear from you.

Relevant skills:
- .NET programming
- Civil 3D
- Object-oriented programming
- IronPython
- VB
- C#
- Problem-solving

questions.question:
Could you describe in your own words the process you would use to replace a specific block in Civil 3D across multiple paper spaces?

We're not looking for actual code here, just an outline of your approach.
Describe your recent experience with similar projects
